name: R4B-OperationOutcome-R5-OperationOutcome
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B OperationOutcome into FHIR R5

element.display: Information about the success/failure of an action

target.display: Information about the success/failure of an action
target.comment: R4B `OperationOutcome` maps as Equivalent to R5 `OperationOutcome`
R4B `OperationOutcome.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `OperationOutcome.contained`
R4B `OperationOutcome.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `OperationOutcome.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `OperationOutcome.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `OperationOutcome.id`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `OperationOutcome.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `OperationOutcome.implicitRules`

element.display: A single issue associated with the action

target.display: A single issue associated with the action
target.comment: R4B `OperationOutcome.issue` maps as Equivalent to R5 `OperationOutcome.issue`

R4B `OperationOutcome.issue.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.code` - code has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/issue-type|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/issue-type|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `OperationOutcome.issue.details` maps as Equivalent to R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.details`

element.display: Additional diagnostic information about the issue

target.display: Additional diagnostic information about the issue
target.comment: R4B `OperationOutcome.issue.diagnostics` maps as Equivalent to R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.diagnostics`

element.display: FHIRPath of element(s) related to issue

target.display: FHIRPath of element(s) related to issue
target.comment: R4B `OperationOutcome.issue.expression` maps as Equivalent to R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.expression`

R4B `OperationOutcome.issue.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `OperationOutcome.issue.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.id`

element.display: Deprecated: Path of element(s) related to issue

target.display: Deprecated: Path of element(s) related to issue
target.comment: R4B `OperationOutcome.issue.location` maps as Equivalent to R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.location`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `OperationOutcome.issue.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

R4B `OperationOutcome.issue.severity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.severity` - severity has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/issue-severity|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/issue-severity|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `OperationOutcome.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `OperationOutcome.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `OperationOutcome.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `OperationOutcome.meta`

R4B `OperationOutcome.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `OperationOutcome.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `OperationOutcome.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `OperationOutcome.text`
